title: Drow Lineage
excerpt: Descended from elves of the Underdark, drow possess superior darkvision and unique innate magic.
markdown:
# Drow Elf Lineage As an elf with Drow lineage, you have been shaped by the magic of the Underdark. You possess the common traits of Elves, plus several unique benefits. --- ## Drow Elf Traits As a Drow Elf, you have the following racial traits.
Darkvision (Common Elf Trait)

You have Darkvision with a range of 60 feet.

Fey Ancestry (Common Elf Trait)

You have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the Charmed condition.

Keen Senses (Common Elf Trait)

You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

Trance (Common Elf Trait)

You don't need to sleep, and magic can't put you to sleep. You can finish a Long Rest in 4 hours if you spend those hours in a trancelike meditation, during which you retain consciousness.

Superior Darkvision (Drow Trait)

Your Darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.

Drow Magic (Drow Trait)

You know the Dancing Lights cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you learn the Faerie Fire spell. When you reach 5th level, you learn the Darkness spell. You always have these spells prepared, and you can cast them once per Long Rest without a spell slot, or by using spell slots of the appropriate level. Your spellcasting ability for these is your choice of Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma.

--- *Source: Player's Handbook (adapted)*
